text: I like to incorporate color in all of my
meals throughout the day there's lots of
inspiration out there even in baby food
recipes curated by color make it easy to
introduce my babies to a variety of
colorful nutrients I like to start my
day off right with a delicious and
bright berry beat muffin you eat with
all of your senses and the smell of
these freshly baked muffins get my kids
excited for breakfast my afternoons are
so busy the kids play dates music
lessons and developing recipes from bone
Appetit a hearty and nutritious salad
really keeps me going throughout my day
the Green Goddess salad with peas and
avocado is perfect and I love to put it
in a jar when I have to take it on the
go when children see you eating your
colors they're going to want to do the
same I'm really excited about this
recipe that I'm working on with yellow
zucchini corn and curried shrimp I love
to introduce my children too adventurous
flavors so that they grow up with an
open palette it's going to be perfect
for tonight's dinner find more eat your
colors inspiration on Plum organics calm
